item.title: 沙特阿拉伯王储 MBS 取消里约 20 国集团峰会之旅
item.description: 一位知情人士称，沙特阿拉伯实际统治者穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼王储已决定不出席下周在里约热内卢举行的 20 国集团峰会。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s de facto ruler Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman has decided not to attend next week’s Group of 20 summit in Rio de Janeiro, said a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国称比尔-黄（Bill Hwang）应因 Archegos 罪被判处 21 年监禁
item.description: Archegos 资本管理公司创始人 Bill Hwang 因欺诈和操纵市场导致其公司 2021 年大规模倒闭，应服刑 21 年。【原文：Archegos Capital Management founder Bill Hwang should serve 21 years behind bars for fraud and market manipulation that led to his firm’s massive 2021 collapse, prosecutors recommended ahead of his sentencing next week.】

item.title: 报道称印度医院火灾后新生儿恐将死亡
item.description: 据当地媒体报道，周五晚间，印度北部北方邦一家政府医院的新生儿科发生火灾，恐怕至少有 10 名新生儿死亡。【原文：At least 10 newborns are feared dead after a fire broke out at a neonatal unit of a government hospital in India’s northern Uttar Pradesh state on Friday night, according to local media reports.】

item.title: 万宜加强为超强台风，威胁菲律宾
item.description: 热带气旋 "曼怡 "已增强为超强台风，有可能给菲律宾的主要岛屿带来强降雨和巨浪。【原文：Tropical cyclone Man-yi has strengthened into a super typhoon, threatening to bring intense rains and high waves on the Philippines’ main island that’s still reeling from a string of storms in recent weeks.】

item.title: 艾伯塔省省长为提高 "中等 "回报率的 Aimco 清理行动辩护
item.description: 艾伯塔省省长达尼埃尔-史密斯（Danielle Smith）表示，她的政府计划最早在下周任命该省养老金管理机构的新董事会成员；这是为提高她所谓的 "中等收益 "而进行的一系列改革中的一步。【原文：Alberta Premier Danielle Smith said her government plans to name new board members for the provincial pension manager as early as next week — one step in a series of reforms to boost what she called “middling returns.”】

item.title: 面对特朗普，习近平扮演全球自由贸易捍卫者的角色
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对全世界征收关税之际，习近平再次不失时机地将自己定位为国际贸易体系的首要捍卫者。【原文：As Donald Trump threatens to impose tariffs on the entire world, Xi Jinping is once again wasting no time in positioning himself as the premier defender of the international trading system.】

item.title: 中国的 "强势货币 "梦遭遇特朗普回归
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平希望拥有一种足够稳定的 "强势货币"，以便在全球贸易中发挥日益重要的作用。唐纳德-特朗普的回归似乎将挑战这一雄心。【原文：China’s President Xi Jinping wants a “powerful currency” that is stable enough to play a rising role in global trade. Donald Trump’s return looks set to challenge that ambition.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯部门主管表示，计划在一年内进行海洋业务 IPO

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称，美国通胀率正以强劲势头向 2% 的目标迈进

item.title: 前中国人民银行官员称，如果特朗普提高关税，中国将采取报复行动
item.description: 中国央行前高官朱民表示，如果当选总统唐纳德-特朗普兑现对中国进口商品征收 60% 关税的承诺，中国将予以反击。【原文：China will fight back if President-elect Donald Trump follows through on his promise to impose a 60% tariff on Chinese imports, according to Zhu Min, a former top official at the Chinese central bank.】

item.title: 由于欧盟森林砍伐计划的不确定性，ICE 推迟了变更计划
item.description: 洲际交易所公司（Intercontental Exchange Inc）正在暂缓对咖啡和可可市场进行计划中的调整，以符合欧盟的森林砍伐法规，因为该法律何时生效尚不确定。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange Inc. is holding off on planned changes in coffee and cocoa markets to comply with the European Union’s deforestation regulation amid uncertainty over when the laws would take effect.】

item.title: 安杜里尔主席与特朗普就美国军事改革进行磋商
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普及其团队与国防技术初创公司 Anduril Industries Inc. 的执行主席特雷-斯蒂芬斯（Trae Stephens）进行了磋商，这凸显了即将上任的政府计划整顿美国军队。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump and his team consulted with Trae Stephens, executive chairman of defense technology startup Anduril Industries Inc., underscoring the incoming administration’s plans to shake up the US military, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 参议员呼吁调查马斯克与俄罗斯的 SpaceX 合同
item.description: 两名美国民主党参议员呼吁对埃隆-马斯克参与美国政府与其公司 SpaceX 之间的合同进行调查，理由是据报道他与弗拉基米尔-普京总统及其他俄罗斯官员的接触引发了国家安全问题。【原文：Two Democratic US senators called for an investigation into Elon Musk’s involvement in contracts between the US government and his company SpaceX, citing national security concerns raised by his reported contact with President Vladimir Putin and other Russian officials.】

item.title: 华尔街大选后的市场热情正在降温
item.description: 在经历了大选后的冒险狂欢后，本周股票投资者逐渐冷静下来，因为杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在降息问题上发出的 "缓慢 "信息冷却了推动华尔街创下历史记录的特朗普贸易兴奋情绪。【原文：After a post-election risk-taking binge, stock investors sobered up this week as Jerome Powell’s go-slow message on interest-rate cuts cooled the Trump trade euphoria that drove Wall Street to records.】

item.title: S&P 公司看好南非的增长前景
item.description: 在S&P全球评级公司将南非的债务前景从 "稳定 "上调至 "积极 "后，南非的信用评级上调前景有所改善。【原文：South Africa’s prospects for a credit rating upgrade improved after S&P Global Ratings lifted the nation’s outlook on its debt to positive from stable.】

item.title: Entergy 正与其最大客户讨论小型核反应堆问题
item.description: 公用事业公司 Entergy Corp. 首席执行官德鲁-马什（Drew Marsh）表示，随着工厂和人工智能数据中心的电力需求激增，该公司正在与一些最大的客户商谈部署小型核反应堆的事宜。【原文：Utility Entergy Corp. is in talks with some of its biggest customers about deploying small nuclear reactors as electricity demand surges from factories and artificial intelligence data centers, said Chief Executive Officer Drew Marsh.】

item.title: 因税收收入，S&P 将爱尔兰评级展望上调至正面
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）将爱尔兰的信用评级展望定为正面，这凸显了该国在下月大选前的财政状况是多么稳健。【原文：S&P Global Ratings put a positive outlook on Ireland’s credit rating, underscoring just how robust the country’s finances are ahead of next month’s general election.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后投资者削减墨西哥比索赌注
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）当选后，基金经理们削减了对墨西哥比索的押注，担心他的第二任政府会破坏世界上最大的贸易关系。【原文：Money managers cut their bets on Mexico’s peso in the wake of Donald Trump’s election, fearing that his second administration will spoil the world’s biggest trade relationship.】

item.title: 对冲基金因特朗普赢得大选而削减黄金看涨赌注
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普在大选中的决定性胜利减少了对贵金属的避风港需求，基金经理们对黄金的看涨押注降至三个多月来的最低点。【原文：Money managers’ bullish wagers on gold fell to the lowest in more than three months as Donald Trump’s decisive election victory reduced haven demand for the precious metal.】

item.title: 资金短缺，Northvolt 救援行动濒临失败

item.title: 优惠券助推需求，稳定高等级债券利差
